arts.ttl: Murilloâ€™s lucky strike secures Forest another point towards European push
arts.sum: Murillo might not have known much about his goal as he diverted a Neco Williams shot into the net to rescue a point.

arts.ttl: Crystal Palace, Nottingham Forest starting lineups confirmed: Stick or twist for Nuno?
arts.sum: Crystal Palace, Nottingham Forest announce starting XIs for Monday's Premier League fixture.

arts.ttl: Crystal Palace vs Nottingham Forest: Team news, score prediction and Champions League qualification state of play
arts.sum: Crystal Palace are currently 12th in the table and on a four-game winless run in the league, but reached the FA Cup final in their last match. Forest's UCL ambitions have been hit by three defeats in four matches and Thursday's loss to Brentford leaves them sixth in the table, three points behind fifth-placed Chelsea in the final qualifying spot.

arts.ttl: Team News: Crystal Palace vs. Nottingham Forest injury, suspension list, predicted XIs
arts.sum: Sports Mole rounds up all of the latest injury and suspension news ahead of Monday's Premier League clash between Crystal Palace and Nottingham Forest.
